name: .SOB File Extension
summary: Learn about .SOB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Graphics file used by Impress, the graphics editing program included with the OpenOffice productivity suite; contains a fill pattern used for painting the background of an image with gravel, leaves, flowers, or other patterns.

content: You can access the bitmap styles in Impress by selecting Format → Fill/Area → Bitmap from the application menu.
NOTE: OpenOffice.org was replaced by Apache OpenOffice in 2012.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
